name: Lizard Maker
description:
use this character creator to make lizard or lizard-like avatars for your rpg characters, OCs, sonas, profile pics, or whatever else you want!

this game is currently in ALPHA, which means many more features and fixes are to come! questions, feedback, and requests all encouraged!

Coming Soon:

~ texture and color editing

~ lighting editing

~ jowls & tongues

~ more piercings & jewelry

~ more textures

~ borders/frames/plaques

~ fixing visual glitches

if you use these for your profile pics: a credit or shoutout would be awesome but its not required at all, have fun with it!

i would love to see your beautiful creations, feel free to tag or dm me @ThanaOrchard on Twitter don't be shy!

please do not sell or claim ownership over the art in this game thats messed up!! and i will spit venom on you HISSS HISS SUPPORT SMALL ARTISTS

🐍 🐉 🦕🦎 🐊 🦖
